Detailed Description

Model an output stream of trees of the same species.

void otreestream::add ( std::string  namen,
std::vector< double > &  data,
char  iotype = 'D' 
)

Specify the name of a variable to be added to the tree and and the address from which its value is to be read.

Note: name can have the form <name>[<countername>], e.g., JetEt[numberJet] if it is of variable length. Of course, the variable numberJet must be stored also! For a variable of fixed length use e.g., JetEt[10].
